column5: I don't know how old it is, but it's new to me.  cool idea.  It looks like the planer pulls pretty hard side angles.   There are 2 videos on the left menu, one showing him navigate around and in between 2 round weed pockets.    It's an interesting toy but i sure it affects your level of  control over lure action.  It would be good for dragging bait around weedlines.  http://www.bulletbobber.com/shorefishing.html
